casebody.data:
172 A.3d 1079 STATE OF NEW JERSEY, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. JULIAN B. HAMLETT, DEFENDANT-APPELLANT.

M-271 September Term 2017

079145 November 2, 2017

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the American Civil Liberties Union of New Jersey for leave to file a brief and argue as amicus curiae is granted. The parties may serve and file briefs in response on or before December 4, 2017. Oral argument is limited to five minutes.
